thread.title: Commissioner will discipline texting Philly ambulance driver
thread.title_full: Commissioner will discipline texting Philly ambulance driver

title: Commissioner will discipline texting Philly ambulance driver
text:
Fire commissioner promises to discipline Philadelphia ambulance driver caught texting on video 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 9/9/15 9:05 am EDT - Updated: 9/9/15 9:05 am EDT 
PHILADELPHIA â€” Philadelphia Fire Commissioner Derrick Sawyer says an ambulance driver caught texting while driving will be disciplined. 
WPVI-TV ( http://6abc.cm/1hVpvQ3 ) reports the unidentified driver can be seen texting on cellphone video taken by Ebony Clarke. The woman tells the TV station she recorded the video while the driver was taking her son to a hospital for a cut on his head. 
Clarke says the driver never put down his phone. 
Sawyer says he's "disgusted" by the video, which was posted on the TV station's website. 
Sawyer says drivers aren't allowed to use their cellphones for any reason. 
Sawyer says, "We are going to identify the person in the video and we are going to bring him in. We'll discipline him." 
Sawyer isn't saying how the driver will be disciplined. 
Information from: WPVI-TV, http://www.6abc.com
